meanings.definition: A person or group that removes a ruler from power.
meanings.sent1: The dethroners led a peaceful protest to remove the unjust ruler.
meanings.sent2: The dethroners gathered support from the people to overthrow the king.
meanings.sent3: The dethroners celebrated their victory with a feast after dethroning the tyrant.
meanings.sent4: The dethroners' actions shook the foundations of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The dethroners' bravery will be remembered in history books.

meanings.definition: The act of removing a ruler from power.
meanings.sent1: After the dethroners succeeded, a new era began in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The dethroners' plan to overthrow the monarch was carefully executed.
meanings.sent3: The dethroners' strategy was as precise as a well-played game of chess.
meanings.sent4: The dethroners' victory echoed through the halls of the palace.
meanings.sent5: The dethroners' determination inspired others to stand up for justice.
